Description: Red-brown pottery ostracon, from the body of a vessel, interior grooved and unevenly covered with an unidentified black deposit, with remains of six lines of black-painted demotic text on the exterior.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (91935) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/91935)
Acquisition name: Purchased through: R J Moss & Co
